pages.text: Having a lot of poppet takes up quite a lot of inventory space.$(br)This is were the poppet shelf comes into play. It allows you to store your poppets in a safe place while still being able to take advantage of their effects.$(br)In order for the poppet shelf to work the chunk it is in must be loaded. A chunk loader is recommended.
Only poppets bound to the placer of the poppet shelf will be usable. The poppet shelf also displays the poppets it contains on top of it.
